characteristics.vegetation: Dense foliage, towering trees, and a variety of ferns
elements: Water Flowing lifeblood of the world, master of adaptation and change.
Wood Silent witness of time, carrier of life's cycle of growth and decay.
Earth Immovable foundation, embodying strength and permanence.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
Life Sacred breath of existence, master of growth and healing.
Emerald Gem of renewal and hope, harnessing the verdant energy of life.
